pages.text: 26|137|sillo igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui gwanseub-e bulgwahamyeo
26|138|ulineun beol-eul badji anihadoda
26|139|ileohge geudeul-i geuleul bujeong hamae hananim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossno la geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hadeola
26|140|sillo geudaeui junim-eun jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|141|samudeuui baegseong-eun seonjijadeul eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|142|geudeul-ui hyeongje sallega geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
26|143|sillo naneun neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|144|geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|145|geuloinhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junim-eulo buteo issnola
26|146|igos-eseo neohuiga soyuhan geosdeul-i neohuiui hyanglag-eul wihae nam-a iss-eulila saeng-gaghaneunyo
26|147|jeong-wongwa saemteoga
26|148|gyeongjagjiwa muleu-ig-eoganeun jong lyeonamuwa
26|149|neohuiga dollo jeong-gyohage se-un jibdeul-i geudaelo anjeonhalila saeng-gagha neunyo
26|150|hananim-eul dulyeowohago naege sunjonghala
26|151|bangtanghan jadeul-ui myeonglyeong-eul ttaleuji malla
26|152|geudeul-eun jisang-eseo saagham-eul haenghal ppun gaeseonhaji anhneun jadeul-ila
26|153|geudeul-i malhagil neoneun masul-egeollyeo issneun ja jung-e hanala
26|154|neoneun uliwa daleulba eobsneun han ingan-e bulgwahani nega jinsilhan ja jung-e issdamyeon geu yejeung-eul daela
26|155|ittae geuga daedabhagil yeogi amkeos-ui nagtaga issnani jeonghayeojin eoneu nal i nagtaga mul-eul masil gwon liga iss-eul geos-iyo geuligo neohuiga mul-eul masil gwonliga iss-eul geos-ila
26|156|geu nagtaleul haechiji malla geu leohji anihamyeon widaehan nal jingbeol-i neohuileul eomseubhalila
26|157|geudeul-eun geu nagtaleul salhaehagoseo huhoehayeoss-euna
26|158|geudeul-ege jingbeol-i naelyeojyeossno la sillo geu an-eneun yejung-i iss-eoss-eu ni geudeul daedasuga midji ani hayeoss deola
26|159|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
